text: A 26-year-old man who survived the Supernova festival which Hamas gunmen stormed on Saturday, has recalled his traumatic escape from the site.Shye Weinstein had moved to Israel from Canada just a few months ago and bought a last-minute ticket to join his cousin at the festival. He captured on camera, how he and his friends fled to safety.At least 260 Israelis were killed by Hamas gunmen on Saturday at the rave. Many are still missing, feared to have been taken hostage in Gaza.Video Journalist: Anastassia Zlatopolskai© 2023 BBC. The BBC is not responsible for the content of external sites.
